column1: #text=I had made an appointment at my favorite salon earlier in the month , with my preferred stylist .
#text=I usually keep on a schedule of getting my hair trimmed up once a month , and this time was no different .
#text=I got inside and informed the girl at the desk who I was and that I already had an appointment .
#text=She logged it down and told me that I could have a seat , while my preferred stylist finished up with her previous client .
#text=I used the time to catch up on some light reading and listening to the radio station that was being played over the speakers in the salon .
#text=The girl at the desk let me know when I could be seated at my stylist 's station .
#text=She started to make small talk as she put the cape over my shoulders to catch the trimmed hairs .
#text=I told her that I just needed my hair reshaped and she got to work .
#text=She chats a bit while working and I made polite conversation with her .
#text=She snipped away with sharp scissors and used a small comb to part my hair and fix the layers .
#text=When she was done , I told her that it looked great and that I was very happy with it .
#text=She brushed the hair snips off of the cape and removed it .
#text=I thanked her and went back to the desk at the front to pay .
